body: I can do a pull request. Can it be in 2.0 or it should be in 3.0?
Since it looks like a bug, I think it would fit 2.0.

issue.title: Bug #16552: Cached relatation is not used in relation through `via`

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
Added check in `yii\db\ActiveQuery::prepare()` to prevent populating already populated relation when another relation is requested with `via`

| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Is bugfix?    | yes
| New feature?  | no
| Breaks BC?    | no
| Tests pass?   | yes
| Fixed issues  | #16552 

I am not sure that I made the sentence in the changelog right.

body: Reverted the fix since it was breaking another thing. See https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/pull/16588#issuecomment-419568470

I didn't see that the code in Docker is not dynamic, so any changes on the host is not visible in the container. Therefore I didn't see any changes in tests after my changes of the code.
I'll try to fix the error in ActiveRecordTest ASAP.
